page.title: 09K'minster Carpets - Today.
page.content: Kiddermister has been able to retain its prominent position in the textile industry due to the continuing demand for high-quality wool carpets. Kidderminster carpets, mainly Wilton and Axminster, are exported all over the world; most of the larger orders come from the USA and Saudi Arabia. Carpets are often specially made for palaces, large hotels, casinos and airports. About 6250 people (20% of the working population) are employed in the carpet industry, dispersed between the ten large factories and numerous small ones. Between them, every week, 40000 to 100000 sq. m. of carpet is produced, 60-70% of all British carpets. Today carpets are as vital to the town as they have ever been during the last 250 years.
